channel.title: USA on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in USA on PepsFeeder

item.title: US conduct exercises in case of nuclear war with Russia
item.description: The United States conducted “small” exercises in the event of a Russian nuclear strike against Europe and a retaliatory attack by the United States, a Pentagon spokesman said.

item.title: Bernie Sanders: "Here is the message to Russia: Stay out of American elections.
item.description: ‘Sen. Bernie Sanders answer to the reporter asking about the claim that Russia is helping get Bernie elected. ​” He is telling us they are interfering in this campaign right now in 2020.

item.title: The discovery leads to drugs targeting dozens of types of cancer
item.description: By turning off genes one by one, researchers from the United Kingdom and the United States have targeted cancer with new drugs. The author, Sean Lintern, said in a report in the British newspaper “The Independent”, that scientists have made an important step towards developing new drugs that target specific genes within dozens of types of cancer.

item.title: The dream of becoming a billionaire
item.description: Once a symbol of the American dream, huge wealth is being criticized in a country where the wealth gap is widening, and all Democratic candidates want to tax it.

item.title: Expert: Washington does not want to face NATO ally "Turkey"
item.description: Political analyst and adviser Ali Hussein Bakir, the US administration concluded that it would be “absurd” to engage in a confrontation with Turkey after President Donald Trump confirmed his commitment to withdraw troops from Syria.
